subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Anthony Davis has made yet another leap in his third season, becoming one of the two or three best players in the N.B.A., but he has been unable to lead the Pelicans to the postseason.
snippet: Anthony Davis has made yet another leap in his third season, becoming one of the two or three best players in the N.B.A., but he has been unable to lead the Pelicans to the postseason.
